about_the_game: You devoured the sinners... Now prepare to head bop to DEVIL DEVOUR ALIVE DX's synthwave-vs-orchestra soundtrack by MERCURIUS FM. Studio remastered in the latest CD audio quality format and including a bonus "Mega Mix" track.
